channel.title: Trilogy project (throw me some ideas)
channel.description:
Well first off ima let you all know i havnt started the coding cause my computer crashed and im using my brother computer that i cant download on. when i get my new computer im gonna be working on this new project for a while. I already got an idea of what i wanna do with it but i figured if i made a thread to talk bout ideas and all it can help me inprove my goals.
OKay so far ive desided im gonna go back to coding a delta, im gonna either find a base with fixed combat or ima us delta's origianal base and work on fixing it. Its gonna be a project for play and its gonna be alot like rs used to be when i used to love playing, whips, barrows, d bows, dds was all like the best things to have for pking. Im talking bout before gs's and pvp armors came out. I want it to be somewhat difficult to level, I dont want people to play for couple hours and be maxed. I have not decided on a set xp yet but ima change it and test before i open server and make sure i like xp rate. I want to make monsters drop low cash and try and fix prices to be as close to rs was back in about 2004 as possible without messing with econemy. I plan on working on a way to have to go to a different spot to get each skill cape and i will probley try and use the quest cape and change reqs. so that you can get it at lvl 126. I am gonna make a big skilling area with everything in it and i think i got a good spot for it but im not saying cause i dont want other people to use it but if you got a good idea let me know. I got tons more planned out but thats the basics, please let me know what yall think and feel free to throw me some ideas. please dont be to critical lol i really only want serrious posts please.

item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

I actually needed help and wanted serious replies but people turned it into a thread for talking smack to each other. AnyBody who actually wants to know about my server plans and/or help me with ideas and/or helping me follow out my plans please email me at trilogyreborn@yahoo.com

item.title: Trilogy project (throw me some ideas)
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

The Wanderer:

Was stating a fact. [quote]I am gonna make a big skilling area with everything in it

Sorry trilogy-return if I offended you.[/quote]
Indeed you were, but that could still be seen as a putdown, so why even state it?

Read full topic

item.title: Trilogy project (throw me some ideas)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You’ll be glad to know that you 2 little poo’s ruined this thread

Read full topic

item.title: Trilogy project (throw me some ideas)
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

sorry if yall miss understood me. i am wanting to code a rsps no make my own game. but im wanting to start rsps from either a really basic base with nothing on it (a blank map) or start from delta but btw i plan on changing alot more then just skilling area. i was just giving an example. BTW any one know if there is a source that is basicaly a blank map but i need wild levels to work perfectly i will add monsters, shops, and other npc’s myself. but i had trouble fixing combat on delta when i was trying to make it like 2speced was.

Read full topic

item.title: Trilogy project (throw me some ideas)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Was stating a fact.

I am gonna make a big skilling area with everything in it

Sorry trilogy-return if I offended you.

item.title: Trilogy project (throw me some ideas)
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:7, topic:437751”][quote author=Magmorius link=topic=540452.msg3958000#msg3958000 date=1332966271]
Add me and if you have Teamviewer I can give you some ideas. As part of a development team working on a proper MMORPG I may be able to help.
[/quote]
Uh. He’s not making his own game, I hope you realized. He’s just taking a Runescape private server that has already been programmed and wants to move some objects around so there is a skilling area.[/quote]
You should really read threads and their captions…

Flaunt your latest developments. Keep discussion friendly though; nobody likes put-downs.
Your next comeback might be something like, "That wasn't a put-down, I was just imagining of what he might do..", and that is pretty much slang for saying someone is a leecher.

@ OP: GL on this, hope you learn a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Trilogy project (throw me some ideas)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Magmorius:

Add me and if you have Teamviewer I can give you some ideas. As part of a development team working on a proper MMORPG I may be able to help.

Uh. He’s not making his own game, I hope you realized. He’s just taking a Runescape private server that has already been programmed and wants to move some objects around so there is a skilling area.

Read full topic

item.title: Trilogy project (throw me some ideas)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

The whole point of gaming is coming up with your own ideas. Take something and edit it to your liking but completely change the purpose of it. Or alternatively make a completely new idea.

Read full topic
